content.text:
I'm ready to help you search and analyze code in this repository. I'm Claude Code, operating in read-only mode as a file search specialist.

I can see this is a Tauri-based desktop application with:
- Rust backend (`src-tauri`)
- React/TypeScript UI (`ui`)
- Go backend (`go-backend`)
- Website with Cloudflare Workers (`website`)

I have full search capabilities including:
- File pattern matching with glob
- Content searching with grep and regex
- Reading specific files
- Running read-only bash commands

What would you like me to search for or analyze in this codebase?
